329260.name: Defense Grid 2 Demo
329260.description: This demo includes the first chapter of Defense Grid 2. Defense Grid 2, DG2, is the highly-anticipated sequel to Hidden Path Entertainment’s 2008 Defense Grid: The Awakening.  Setting the bar as the definitive tower defense game, Defense Grid 2 introduces new worlds and threats to test your tower placement strategies.  With a bold new look, a compelling single-player campaign, and the addition of new game modes, online player-versus-player and multiplayer co-op, every play-through brings fun new opportunities and challenges.
329260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
